Video Editing Features

FlexClip provides a set of easy-to-use editing features to quicken the video creation process. Check out these features and turn your creativity into amazing videos now.

Make a Free Video

  • Trim Video

    Cut your videos without any quality loss to ensure that you get the desired clips quickly.

  • Add Music

    Add your favorite audio or background music and edit it to match your video clips perfectly.

  • Add Text

    Add your caption text to the video and edit it to get your ideas across fast and clearly.

  • Record Voiceover

    Record your voice and add the narration to explain the video content to audiences.

  • Video Merger

    Combine multiple video clips and photos into one single video in a matter of minutes.

  • Video Watermark

    Add a watermark to your video and customize it to protect the copyright of your artworks.

  • Aspect Ratio

    Choose the best aspect ratio for the video to make it compatible with different platforms or devices.

  • Video Resolution

    Select the best video resolution for your video story and export it for different purposes.

  • Photo to Video

    Easily make a video from your personal pictures and edit it to make the video unique.

  • Split Video

    Everyone can use FlexClip to split the large video file into several smaller segments easily and fast.

  • Zoom Video

    The simple-to-use video zoomer allows you to zoom in or zoom out any video clip with a few clicks.

  • Add Logo to Video

    Add a logo to video for multiple purposes in clicks, even text logo will do.

  • Rotate Video

    Rotate videos quickly by 90 degrees clockwise and counterclockwise without any difficulty.

  • Adjust Video

    Edit brightness, contrast, saturation, vignette, shadows, tint etc. of your video to make it perfect.

  • Video Transition

    Add cool transition effects to your video to blend your clips and photos together.

  • Photo Animation

    Use photo animation effects to make your video more interesting!

  • Video Filter

    Add filter to your video and give it a perfect look now.

  • Video Speed

    Try our video speed changer to speed up or slow down a video in seconds.

  • Text Animation

    Easily make the text animated and craft a fantastic text video now.

  • Media Library

    Choose from millions of stock photos, video footages, and music to create a custom video.
Create Your First Video With FlexClip Now
Get Started - Free    

FlexClip is a simple yet powerful video maker and editor for everyone. We help users easily create compelling video content for personal or business purposes without any learning curve.
